thread.section_title: eVitamins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eVitamins | www.evitamins.com
thread.title: Debra V.K.

author: Debra V.K.
title: Debra V.K.
text: I recently found eVitamins and was impressed with their good prices. One item I ordered was actually a smaller size than what was advertised. I emailed them and very quickly received an email back with an apology - they did not realize the company had made the product weight smaller. And they issued a $10 credit to my account, which was above and beyond what I expected. Impressed with this company.
